benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/invoiceItems/{invoiceItemId}/customFields - Add custom fields to invoice item

covered: Valid Payload covered by TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC10 (empty array acceptable), TC18 (integration retrieval confirms persistence)
Invalid Payload covered by TC08 (malformed body), TC06 (invalid invoice item ID format), TC09 (missing request body) and TC11 (extra/unknown fields handling) within input
Duplicate Submission covered by TC17 (duplicate custom field names behavior)
Large Payloads covered by TC14 (maximum allowed number of CustomField objects)
Validation covered by TC06, TC07, TC08, TC09 (various invalid or missing header/body scenarios) and TC21 (sanitization/injection considerations)
Server Error Handling covered by TC13 (service unavailable)
gaps: Rate limiting tests are missing to verify handling of multiple requests in a short period
Caching behavior tests are missing (ETag/Cache-Control headers) for POST responses
Explicit pagination tests are not applicable to POST, but guidelines for GET/pagination remain unaddressed in this feature
Formal unauthorized access tests are present (TC12), but explicit coverage of different roles/permissions scenarios beyond api-user could be expanded
recommendations: Add rate-limiting/throttling tests for POST /customFields to ensure proper behavior under high load
Introduce caching-related verifications (ETag/Cache-Control) on POST results where applicable
Enhance authorization coverage with additional roles/scenarios beyond the basic authenticated/unauthorized cases
Consider explicit tests for edge-case validations not yet fully exercised (e.g., duplicate handling policy in TC17, and exact 201 vs 400 decisions in TC11 regarding extra fields)
